name: Acquire.Fi
description: The Acquire.Fi Mission Acquire.Fi is where Investing and Web3 intersect, creating a new wealth building paradigm for all. Two products, intricately linked: -The first crypto M&A marketplace. -Investment pools that allow retail investors to access fractionalized ownership of web3 companies, traditional businesses and real world assets. A new era of real yield is coming to crypto with projects like Centrifuge and Acquire.Fi. Acquire.Fi is putting sustainable APY from real world revenue earning businesses on-chain and available to everyone. Forget inflationary tokens printing staking rewards. Access stable dividend returns from real world factories, schools and web2 profit earning businesses. An era of inclusive investing has begun.
